title: left click + screen lock
body: this has been happening for over a year. its only every few games sometimes it happens two games in a row but its completely random. my left click only works if i click 2 or 3 times and my screen is permanently locked. Pls understand that i know how to unlock the screen. it will not unlock, the only way i can move the screen is by clicking on the minimap(2 or three times)

replies.body:
hey thanks for replying!  i have used a few different mouses (idk if thats the proper way to say it since were not talking about furry mice lol but wtv) but they all work fine.  its only every few games that this happens,and iv been thinking that it might tie in with this other issue i found.(also has been happening for about a year
 when i close league it still leaves 1 version of league running in my dashboard. when i try to force quit it it doesn't work. iv had 5 different versions of league running b4 and only one of them was one that u could actually use the rest were just unclosable version of it (like they won't force quit. the only way i get them to go away if by manually shutting off my computer and saying to not open the applications that are previously running.) iv also tried using activity monitor and closing that way but still doesn't work.   so do u think that this could have something to do with the first issue?

now that i spilled that whole shpeil what other steps should i take?
 
also i feel like i should have put this in the first post but I'm playing on a mac desktop running el capitan 10.11.6

thanks again for the help

It's hard to say what's causing this issue, but there are some steps we can take to rule out possibilities.  Would you be able to snag a different mouse?  This can help determine if the problem is with the mouse of something else.  Let me know!
